message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.CL

The paper discusses the design of personal communication systems and their impact on social interaction, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also touches upon issues related to communication and social dynamics, which could be classified under cybernetics (cs.CY), social and information networks (cs.SI), and social and behavioral sciences (cs.SD). Additionally, the paper discusses the role of ambiguity in communication, which could be related to natural language processing (cs.CL).
